# This file gives the expected spectral resolution for EXES,
# by slit width (arcsec). Nearest values are used with no
# interpolation.
#
# Applicable to wavelengths between 11um and 15um.
#
#SLITWID    RP
0.81        100000.
1.08        100000.
1.44        100000.
2.11        92000.0
2.65        73252.8
3.20        60662.5
9.43        20500.
